Rob Friedman
Principal Technical Business Analyst at Cox Automotive
May 7, 2006, Jacob was senior to Rob but didn’t manage directly

I worked with Jacob at Exigen.  Jacob is a brilliant guy (literally a rocket scientist by training), having built a rules engine with a small team that outperformed market leaders.  He is also a terrific guy with a real sense of fair play and respectful treatment of his work peers and those reporting to him.  I would love the opportunity to work with him again.

Irina Altfeder
Russian Speaking Licensed Tour Guide in Israel. Private "Eshkol Car" Tours
October 14, 2011, Jacob was a client of Irina’s

On Oct. 5, 2011 Irina was our guide on a personal tour around Jerusalem. In one day she managed to take us to so many interesting places and to feed us not only with facts but with the spirit of this great City. Irina is very knowledgeable and personable, and it was a pleasure to attend historical places with her guidance.Thank you, Irina!

Igor Khlystov
Consultant, Enterprise Architect at Ericsson
September 24, 2010, Jacob managed Igor directly

Every time when I needed a complex problem to be solved I knew if I give this problem to Igor I will receive a well-thought, elegant solution and always in time. Being real software professional, Igor takes a pride for what he is doing, making sure that other people will understand and manage to maintain software he creates. I would not hesitate to give Igor any new application to design and implement.
